subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams was voted the WTA Tour player of the year for the second time. Williams also received the award for 2002. She won the United States Open in September and ended last year ranked No. 1. Dinara Safina was selected most improved player in 2008, and Zheng Jie was chosen comeback player of the year..
